channel.title: Comments on: Links for Tue 16 Oct 2007

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: Bummer that I don't get a free Leopard upgrade for <a href="http://sonicchicken.net/blog/wordpress/2007/10/08/new-imac/" rel="nofollow">my new iMac</a>. :( Steve must have known that I'd be willing to pay for all the cool new Leopardy goodness.
item.content:encoded: Bummer that I don’t get a free Leopard upgrade for my new iMac. üôÅ Steve must have known that I’d be willing to pay for all the cool new Leopardy goodness.
